EmailTemplate.name: Routed to Notified Users Email
EmailTemplate.subject: FPR Notification: FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Has Been Routed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} has been emailed to you for notification purposes only. No action required from you.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Thank you, FPR System
